author: boudoul
body:
Greetings
This PR is resurrecting the code used in the past for pixel phase2 studies which was sitting in SLHC releases but never ported to the mainstream . It is going to be very useful for the coming phase2 pixel studies. I also created an associated unit test  . 
Finally I take the opportunity to clean old and obsolete stuff in this package, likely more to do but doing gradually 
@emiglior FYI
title: Code for Phase2Pixel Ntuple with Unit Tests (+ cleaning old stuff)
